Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.key

This package contains the code to implement the Idemix key support.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
IssuerKeyPair The issuer's key pair for the CL-signature scheme.
IssuerPrivateKey The Issuer private key (signing key) for the CL signature scheme.
IssuerPublicKey The Issuer's public key for the CL-signature scheme.
Npq Private class to hand over the values of n, p and q.
VEKeyPair Key pair object for verifiable encryption.
VEPrivateKey Private key of a trusted party offering verifiable encryption on its behalf.
VEPublicKey Public key for verifiable encryption.
 

Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.key Description

This package contains the code to implement the Idemix key support. As such it has classes to represent the private and the public key (e.g., of the issuer key pair, or the verifiable encryption key pair). In addition, it contains the implementation of the key generation.

See Also:
@see com.ibm.zrl.idmx.ve
